column4: hi. which distribution is good for old PC pentium III, 800 Mhz, cca 200 MB Sdram? xfce (xubuntu)?
you might want to check out puppy linux, and 'dsl' linux both are designed for very low end machines.
Thats a bit of a low end system. Depends on what apps you specificially want to run also. Abiword is a lot lighter then Openoffice.
abi word is only for MS doc?
